summary:
This mod replaces the clothing of the Riften Guards to a ranger outfit.
I wanted to give it a Lord of the rings feel to it.
descriptionHtml:
The Riften Rangers

This mod replaces the clothing of the Riften Guards to a ranger outfit.
I wanted to give it a Lord of the rings feel to it.
This mod uses meshes and textures from NoseGoblin\'s mod \"Assassins Rangers and Thieves armor\". 
Link: 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4632

==Installation==
Simply place the Textures folder, Meshes folder and the esp. into the Data directory.
Load loose files just incase.

==Uninstallation==
Delete the following files:
Data\\Meshes\\Armor\\CityGuards\\GhelmRiften_0.nif
Data\\Meshes\\Armor\\CityGuards\\GhelmRiften_1.nif
Data\\Meshes\\Armor\\CityGuards\\GhelmRiften_f_0.nif
Data\\Meshes\\Armor\\CityGuards\\GhelmRiften_f_1.nif
Data\\Meshes\\Armor\\CityGuards\\GhelmRiftenGND.nif
Data\\Meshes\\Armor\\CityGuards\\GtorsoRiften_0.nif
Data\\Meshes\\Armor\\CityGuards\\GtorsoRiften_1.nif
Data\\Meshes\\Armor\\CityGuards\\GtorsoRiften_f_0.nif
Data\\Meshes\\Armor\\CityGuards\\GtorsoRiften_f_1.nif
Data\\Meshes\\Armor\\CityGuards\\GtorsoRiftenGND.nif
Data\\Textures\\Armor\\CityGuards\\GhelmRiften.dds
Data\\Textures\\Armor\\CityGuards\\GtorsoRiften.dds
Data\\Textures\\Armor\\CityGuards\\GtorsoRiften_f.dds
Data\\TheRiftenRangers.esp

==Credits==
Martin Purvis
NoseGoblin

==Other==
Send me a pm if there\'s any bother.
author: Martin Purvis
